name: Watsons Singapore +Pharmacy + GNC - Takashimaya S.C, Ngee Ann City (Click & Collect)

reviews.text: Massive pharmacy at the heart of Orchard Road from this popular chain. Signs to the pharmacist is clearly indicated. There‚Äôs even fridge stocked with drinks to go!

visited on the weekend, there was an ongoing cash voucher game card promotion at watsons. staff member Praiya was very helpful and patient with processing the payment to maximise our cash voucher. üëçüëç
Always feel so welcoming at Watsons Ngee Ann city. Customer executive Hongyan is very friendly and helpful. Love their service !
Ur supplement promoters very problem. Kept staring and following every moment as if I want to steal LOL i dont have time for this kind of service

Famous beauty facial hair nail skin body care as well as Health food supplements pharmaceuticals dressings bandages sports surgical and household cleaning products suppliers. Conveniently located at neighbourhood of luxurious hotels resorts shopping centre at Ng Ann City Orchard Road within walking distance covered  pathway to Orchard MRT and free shuttle bus to Shangri-la Hotel Apartments Hotel Jen and Tanglin Mall with plenty of dinning shopping banking supermarkets library cinemas entertainments groceries sundries postage services and amenities nearby. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.
